mapper.select: select count(*) from members where id= #{id} and pw= #{pw}
mapper.insert: insert into members (id, pw, name, phone, email, zone_code, address1, address2, join_date) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zone_code}, #{address1}, #{address2}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, zone_code = #{zone_code}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2} WHERE id = #{id}
